title: What Fed Rate Increases Mean for Mortgages, Credit Cards and More
abstract: Savers will benefit and borrowers can expect to pay more on credit cards, student loans and other forms of debt.

title: What companies are saying about inflation and recession risks.
Germany Counts on Chilled Gas to Keep Warm Over Winter
abstract: As Russia squeezes the flow of natural gas, German officials are urgently turning toward an option they had earlier disregarded: liquefied natural gas.
byline: By Melissa Eddy, Stanley Reed and Patrick Junker

multimedia.caption: A port station for shipments of liquefied natural gas is under construction in Wilhelmshaven, Germany.
